author: By KEITH RIDLER Associated Press
title: Idaho lawmaker flouts stay-at-home order with church service
description: BOISE, Idaho (AP) — A northern Idaho lawmaker led a church service on Sunday despite a statewide stay-at-home order by Gov. Brad Little to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
BOISE, Idaho (AP) A northern Idaho lawmaker led a church service on Sunday despite a statewide stay-at-home order by Gov. Brad Little to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.
Republican Rep. Tim Remington, the pastor of The Altar Church in Coeur d'Alene, he… [+2234 chars]
